sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import axios from "axios"; export default function Form(props) { const { values, update, submit, form, setForm } = props const onChange = e => { const name = e.target.name const value = e.target.type === "checkbox" ? e.target.checked : e.target.value update(name, value) } const onSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() const newUser = { name: form.name.trim(), email: form.email.trim(), password: form.password.trim(), tos: true }; submit() axios .post("https://reqres.in/api/users", newUser) .then((res) => { setForm({ name: "", email: "", password: "", tos: false }) }) } return (
) }
